Sébastien Saunier
blog about

Hello,

I'm a software engineer focused on (full-stack) web development. I have been building stuff for the web since 2001. I have a fairly good experience of startups and enjoy building new products using a nice combination of Lean, Agile and development best practices. I do also enjoy having a say about the engineering team workflow and tools.

Since march 2012, I have been working at Applidget as the lead developer of MobiCheckin, an award-winning SaaS solution for professional event organizers. I also bootstrapped a real-time dashboard for Shopify websites, Shopboard. I occasionally freelance, especially for Sogedis.

Before that I worked at VirtuOz, and Google Zürich.

As of 2013, my tools of choice for the job are Rails, Node.js, Macbook Pro, Sublime and a lot of command line awesomeness. I you need any help with your engineering team productivity or a web app development, please drop me a line.
